channel.title: CVE Feed for Synaptics -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synaptics -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6482|2024-08-02T08:28:21.858Z -- synaptics -- synaptics%20fingerprint%20driver
item.description:
Use of encryption key derived from static information in Synaptics Fingerprint Driver allows
an attacker to set up a TLS session with the fingerprint sensor and send restricted commands to the fingerprint sensor.Â This may allow an attacker, who has physical access to the sensor, to enroll a fingerprint into the template database.

item.title: CVE-2023-4936|2024-08-02T07:44:52.647Z -- synaptics -- displaylink%20usb%20graphics%20software%20for%20windows
item.description: It is possible to sideload a compromised DLL during the installation at elevated privilege.

item.title: CVE-2023-5447|2024-06-04T17:28:42.274Z -- synaptics -- synaptics%20fingerprint%20driver
item.description: Missing lock check in SynHsaService may create a use-after-free condition which causes abnormal termination of the service, resulting in denial of service for the Synaptics Hardware Support App.

item.title: CVE-2023-5447|2024-08-02T07:59:44.752Z -- synaptics -- synaptics%20fingerprint%20driver
item.description: Missing lock check in SynHsaService may create a use-after-free condition which causes abnormal termination of the service, resulting in denial of service for the Synaptics Hardware Support App.
